Ryan Lund joined the Raymond James Technology & Communications Group in 1998 to focus on communications infrastructure software and services companies as well as leading Raymond Jamesâ€™ Customer Interaction Management efforts. He has participated in more than 50 transactions, including significant work with software businesses working in strategic advisory, mergers and acquisitions, and capital raising, both public and private. Before joining Raymond James, Mr. Lund worked with Merrill Lynch & Co.

Mr. Lund holds a Bachelor of Arts degree, cum laude, in economics from Harvard University.
